name: params-to-object
description: VS Code extension to convert function params into objects.

commands.title: Convert function params into an object

editor/context.when: resourceExtname == .ts || resourceExtname == .js || resourceExtname == .tsx || resourceExtname == .jsx || resourceExtname == .vue || resourceExtname == .svelte || resourceExtname == .mjs || resourceExtname == .cjs || resourceExtname == .mts || resourceExtname == .cts

objectifyParams.include.description: Space-separated glob patterns of files to include when scanning (use common glob format).

objectifyParams.exclude.description: Space-separated glob patterns of files/folders to exclude when scanning.

objectifyParams.monitorConversions.description: Show a preview dialog for every call conversion, including confirmed valid calls.

objectifyParams.highlightDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds for preview highlighting behavior.
